events.message: The insured reported a vehicle accident that occurred yesterday involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
Upon review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to collision with another vehicle causing visible damage.
Agent Smith was assigned to handle the claim and contact the insured for further details and next steps.
The insured received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is under review.
Request sent to insured for photos of vehicle damage, police report, and insurance details of other party involved.
Insured submitted all requested documentation including detailed photos and the official police collision report.
Investigation initiated by claims team to verify details of the accident and damage assessment on insured vehicle.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the collision caused significant damage covered under policy terms.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to insured outlining coverage amount for vehicle repairs and associated costs.
The insured responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and prompt handling of claim.
The claim was formally approved by the underwriting department confirming the coverage and settlement details.
Settlement payment was issued to the insured's bank account to cover vehicle repairs as per the approved claim.
The claim file was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and no further issues reported.
All related documentation and correspondence were archived for record keeping and future reference if needed.
